functions.name: getLanguage
functions.description: Attempts to determine the language of the content of the tab with id <var>tabId</var>

parameters.name: tabId
parameters.description: The id of the tab whose contents should be evaluated for it's source language

callbackParameters.description: The language of the content found in specified tab.
